title: Option to change HUDs
body: Hey Rito was just wondering if you can add an option in the settings of the game so you can change the HUD to and from the older and newer version because some people like the new one and some dont like the new one, i personally way preferred the fact that the old HUD was easy and simple and the new one is just too much sorry but and option for changing HUDs would be nice :) Thankyou.
